portfolio.title: Remote Yes!
portfolio.description: A web application that helps developers, product designers and other tech workers find remote jobs all over the world.

portfolio.title: My Portfolio Website Design
portfolio.description: A website displaying some of my works, my skills and other important information about my career as a Frontend Software Engineer.

portfolio.title: Radius Puppy
portfolio.description: A web application that helps developers create beautiful shapes to be used on their web applications and landing pages using border radius.

portfolio.title: Trunc Js
portfolio.description: A JavaScript library for truncating strings. Suitable for making post excerpts.

portfolio.title: Read Count
portfolio.description: A JavaScript library for estimating the time it would take to read a post.

portfolio.title: Unique Chars
portfolio.description: A JavaScript library for generating unique strings, numbers and passwords.

portfolio.title: inkmbt
portfolio.description: A JavaScript library for formatting numbers in K, B, T like Twitter.

portfolio.title: African Industrious Ladies
portfolio.description: An organization of African ladies in business helping each other to grow and be independent.
